articles.title: New Specialized Turbo Levo SL II increases power and torque to make climbing less of a chore - BikeRadar
articles.description: Overhauled design sees trail ebike adopt S-Sizing
articles.content:
The latest Turbo Levo SL II electric mountain bike from Specialized has undergone some major updates.
The frame has been redesigned to remove its sidearm, while also offering more geometry adjustabi… [+19120 chars]
